img.alt: New York Mills Drama Club Presents: Anything Goes

a.span: New York Mills Drama Club Presents: Anything Goes

div.p: Although our drama club did not get to perform their show as planned, they were able to put on a performance for a small crowd before the school closure. We are so proud of their heart, hard work and willingness to adapt in an unexpected situation. View photos from the show here!

a.title: Go to comments for New York Mills Drama Club Presents: Anything Goes

img.alt: New York Mills Union Free School

div.h1: New York Mills Union Free School

p.b: New York Mills Union Free School

div.p: Through combined efforts of students, staff, parents, and community members, our mission is to foster the confidence, knowledge, cognition, and character necessary to instill a strong work ethic, to create an environment of tolerance and respect, and to ignite an attitude of inquiry and enthusiasm for learning that will enable students to become productive, responsible citizens.
